male.sjis: ミューノがいないなんて 何があったんだ？
male.ascii: Murno isn't here What should we do?

female.sjis: ミューノがいないなんて 何があったんだろう？
female.ascii: Murno isn't here What should we do?

dialogue.sjis: 話シテイル場合デハ アリマセン サガシテクダサイ
dialogue.ascii: If You Are Going To Talk About Milady's Whereabouts, This Isn't. The Time. Keep Looking For Her.

dialogue.sjis: あ！ そうだな
dialogue.ascii: I! No, I guess you're right

dialogue.sjis: そうだね
dialogue.ascii: Yeah, we should

male.sjis: ミューノがいないなんて 何があったんだ？
male.ascii: Murno isn't here What should we do?

female.sjis: ミューノがいないなんて 何があったんだろう？
female.ascii: Murno isn't here What should we do?

dialogue.sjis: 心配じゃな とにかく我らも さがしに行くべきじゃろう
dialogue.ascii: I worry for her In any case, we should hurry and find her as soon as possible!

male.sjis: そうだな
male.ascii: I guess you're right

female.sjis: そうだね
female.ascii: Yeah, we should

male.sjis: ミューノがいないなんて 何があったんだ？
male.ascii: Murno isn't here What should we do?

female.sjis: ミューノがいないなんて 何があったんだろう？
female.ascii: Murno isn't here What should we do?

dialogue.sjis: ちっ グズグズするな おいていくぞ
dialogue.ascii: Tsk We won't be able to find her if all you do whine and dawdle, slowpoke!

dialogue.sjis: あ！ 悪い
dialogue.ascii: I! My bad.

dialogue.sjis: ごめん
dialogue.ascii: Sorry.

male.sjis: ミューノがいないなんて 何があったんだ？
male.ascii: Murno isn't here What should we do?

female.sjis: ミューノがいないなんて 何があったんだろう？
female.ascii: Murno isn't here What should we do?

dialogue.sjis: イヤな予感がしますわ こういう予感は 外れるといいんですけど
dialogue.ascii: I have bad feeling about this I really hope, just this once, that my gut is wrong all along

male.sjis: そうだな
male.ascii: Here's to hoping

female.sjis: そうだね
female.ascii: I really hope so, too

dialogue.sjis: ミューノとお父さん ドコ行ったんだろう？
dialogue.ascii: Murno and her dad Just where the heck are they

tl_file.dialogue:
でーた不足デス うぇるまん様ノ様子カラ 遠クニハ 行ッテイナイト 思イマスガ
ERROR: Insufficient Data Though Master Wellman Can't Have Wandered Far, Based His State

dialogue.sjis: ホントに どうなってるんだ？
dialogue.ascii: Is that so? I wonder what happend to him

dialogue.sjis: どうなってるの？
dialogue.ascii: I wonder what happend to him

dialogue.sjis: ミューノとお父さん ドコ行ったんだろう？
dialogue.ascii: Murno and her dad Just where the heck are they

dialogue.sjis: ウェルマン殿の様子もどことなく おかしかったからのう 何もないと良いのじゃが
dialogue.ascii: Perhaps it's just me, but Wellman acted a bit unusual thereI hope nothing bad happened to him

dialogue.sjis: ホントに どうなってるんだ？
dialogue.ascii: Is that so? I wonder what happend to him

dialogue.sjis: どうなってるの？
dialogue.ascii: I wonder what happend to him

dialogue.sjis: ミューノとお父さん ドコ行ったんだろう？
dialogue.ascii: Murno and her dad Just where the heck are they

dialogue.sjis: ウェルマンの様子も少し おかしかったんだ もう少し気をつけていれば
dialogue.ascii: Now that I think about it, it's weird Wellman isn't like himself Dammit, if only I noticed sooner

dialogue.sjis: とにかく、さがしに行こう
dialogue.ascii: In any case, we have to go and find them as soon as we can

dialogue.sjis: ミューノとお父さん ドコ行ったんだろう？
dialogue.ascii: Murno and her dad Just where the heck are they

dialogue.sjis: ウェルマン様の様子も少し おかしい気がしたんです 心配ですわ
dialogue.ascii: I noticed Master Wellman was acting very strange back there I'm worried about him

dialogue.sjis: とにかく、さがしに行こう
dialogue.ascii: In any case, we have to go and find them as soon as we can

male.sjis: ウェルマンさんがアニスたちを 逃がしただなんて 何が起きてるんだ！
male.ascii: Wellman let Anise and her cronies get away What is even going on anymore!?

female.sjis: ウェルマンさんがアニスたちを 逃がしただなんて 何が起きてるの？
female.ascii: Wellman let Anise and her cronies get away Just why would he?

dialogue.sjis: 不明デス 原因究明ノタメニモ あにすタチヲ 追イカケマショウ
dialogue.ascii: Cause: Unknown. We Must Find Anise And Her Her Allies First To Know Why.

male.sjis: そうだな、急ごう！ あいつらはまた西門の方の スポート洞窟だ！
male.ascii: You're rightLet's hurry! I have a feeling they must be at the west end of Spoat Grotto!

female.sjis: そうだね、急ごう！ あいつらはまた西門の方の スポート洞窟だよ！
female.ascii: You're rightLet's hurry! I have a feeling they must be at the west end of Spoat Grotto!

male.sjis: ウェルマンさんがアニスたちを 逃がしただなんて 何が起きてるんだ！
male.ascii: Wellman let Anise and her cronies get away What is even going on anymore!?

female.sjis: ウェルマンさんがアニスたちを 逃がしただなんて 何が起きてるの？
female.ascii: Wellman let Anise and her cronies get away Just why would he?

dialogue.sjis: 今はそのことを考えるより ヤツらを追いかけるのが先じゃ！
dialogue.ascii: And right now, we should prioritize chasing down those wretched people Instead of idling about!

male.sjis: そうだな、急ごう！ あいつらはまた西門の方の スポート洞窟だ！
male.ascii: You're rightLet's hurry! I have a feeling they must be at the west end of Spoat Grotto!

male.sjis: ウェルマンさんがアニスたちを 逃がしただなんて 何が起きてるんだ！
male.ascii: Wellman let Anise and her cronies get away What is even going on anymore!?

female.sjis: ウェルマンさんがアニスたちを 逃がしただなんて 何が起きてるの？
female.ascii: Wellman let Anise and her cronies get away Just why would he?

dialogue.sjis: グダグダ考えるのは ヤツらに追いついてからでいい 急ぐぞ！
dialogue.ascii: Don't you dawdle right now! You can ponder all you want after we deal with those bastards! Go!

male.sjis: そうだな、 あいつらはまた西門の方の スポート洞窟だ！
male.ascii: You're right I have a feeling they must be at the west end of Spoat Grotto!

female.sjis: そうだね あいつらはまた西門の方の スポート洞窟だよ！
female.ascii: You're right I have a feeling they must be at the west end of Spoat Grotto!

male.sjis: ウェルマンさんがアニスたちを 逃がしただなんて 何が起きてるんだ！
male.ascii: Wellman let Anise and her cronies get away What is even going on anymore!?

female.sjis: ウェルマンさんがアニスたちを 逃がしただなんて 何が起きてるの？
female.ascii: Wellman let Anise and her cronies get away Just why would he?

dialogue.sjis: それは、わかりません でも、今しなければならないのは それを悩むことではありませんわ！
dialogue.ascii: I do not understand why, either But it wouldn't do us any good if we do nothing but worry!

male.sjis: そうだな、ヤツらを追いかけよう！ ヤツらはまた西門の方の スポート洞窟だ！
male.ascii: Yeah, let's chase after them now! I have a feeling they must be at the west end of Spoat Grotto!

female.sjis: そうだね、まずは追いかけなきゃ！ あいつらはまた西門の方の スポート洞窟だよ！
female.ascii: Yeah, let's chase after them now! I have a feeling they must be at the west end of Spoat Grotto!

dialogue.sjis: みゅーの様ハ すぽーと洞窟ヲ 抜ケタ先デス 急ギマショウ
dialogue.ascii: I Am Also Certain We Can Find Lady Murno Beyond Spoat Grotto. We Must Make Haste.

male.sjis: お前
male.ascii: You

female.sjis: あなた
female.ascii: You

dialogue.sjis: アナタガ目指ス場所ハ ソコ以外 考エラレマセンデシタ チガッテイマシタカ？
dialogue.ascii: I Am Certain You Are Correct About Your Proposed Location. Or Is My Analysis An ERROR?

male.sjis: ううん、 さすがオレのパートナーだよ 急ぐぞ！
male.ascii: No, no, ! You're the best partner I could ever ask for! Let's go!

female.sjis: ううん、 さすがわたしのパートナー！ 急ぐよ！
female.ascii: No, no, ! You're the best partner I could ever ask for! Let's go!

dialogue.sjis: 了解デス
dialogue.ascii: Affirmative.

dialogue.sjis: どうした？ ミューノはスポート洞窟を抜けた 先に行ったぞ
dialogue.ascii: Why do you sound hesitant? I surely do think Murno must beyond Spoat Grotto, as well

male.sjis: お前
male.ascii: You

female.sjis: あなた
female.ascii: You

dialogue.sjis: なんじゃ？ おぬしの考えておる事なぞ お見通しじゃぞ
dialogue.ascii: Is something wrong? You're not plotting to do what I think you're going to, are you?

male.sjis: さすが、 オレのパートナーだよ じゃあ、急ごう！
male.ascii: Bingo, ! Yeah, I was thinking how you're my best partner ever! Anyway, go!

female.sjis: さすが、 わたしのパートナー！ じゃあ、急ぐよ！
female.ascii: Bingo, ! Yeah, I was thinking how you're my best partner ever! Anyway, go!

dialogue.sjis: 承知！
dialogue.ascii: Acknowledged!

なんだ？ あいつらの行き先なら スポート洞窟を抜けた先だぞ
Why are you hesitating? If you forgot where they went to, you said Spoat Grotto earlier.

male.sjis: お前
male.ascii: You

female.sjis: あなた
female.ascii: You

dialogue.sjis: ふ 単純なキサマの考えなど わかって当たり前だ
dialogue.ascii: Hmph Just so you know, I don't need to guess what your simple mind thinks.

male.sjis: さすが、 オレのパートナーだよ じゃあ、急ごう！
male.ascii: Bingo, ! Yeah, I was thinking how you're my best partner ever! Anyway, go!

female.sjis: さすが、 わたしのパートナー！ じゃあ、急ぐよ！
female.ascii: Bingo, ! Yeah, I was thinking how you're my best partner ever! Anyway, go!

dialogue.sjis: 好きにしろ
dialogue.ascii: Do whatever you want

dialogue.sjis: ミューノ様の行き先なら スポート洞窟を抜けた先ですわ 急ぎましょう
dialogue.ascii: You proposed that Lady Murno must surely be found at Spoat Grotto. Let us make haste.

male.sjis: お前
male.ascii: You

female.sjis: あなた
female.ascii: You

dialogue.sjis: あれ、ちがいましたか？ さんの行き先は そこしかないと思いましたけど
dialogue.ascii: OhWhat's the matter? , I was certain you're right on where Milady is

male.sjis: ううん、 さすがオレのパートナーだよ 急ぐぞ！
male.ascii: No, no, ! You're the best partner I could ever ask for! Let's go!

female.sjis: ううん、 さすがわたしのパートナー！ 急ぐよ！
female.ascii: No, no, ! You're the best partner I could ever ask for! Let's go!

dialogue.sjis: はい
dialogue.ascii: Yes.

male.sjis: ミューノは廃墟のどこかだ！ 絶対に見つけ出すぞ！
male.ascii: Murno must be somewhere deep in the ruins! We must find her no matter what!

female.sjis: ミューノは廃墟のどこかだよ 絶対に見つけ出すんだから！
female.ascii: Murno must be somewhere deep in the ruins! We must find her no matter what!

dialogue.sjis: 了解デス みゅーの様ヲ 必ズ 取リ戻シマス
dialogue.ascii: Affirmative Our Current Objective: Bring Back Lady Murno.

male.sjis: ミューノは廃墟のどこかだ！ 絶対に見つけ出すぞ！
male.ascii: Murno must be somewhere deep in the ruins! We must find her no matter what!

female.sjis: ミューノは廃墟のどこかだよ 絶対に見つけ出すんだから！
female.ascii: Murno must be somewhere deep in the ruins! We must find her no matter what!

dialogue.sjis: もちろんじゃとも！ 草の根をわけても さがしだしてやるぞい！
dialogue.ascii: Indeed! We must find her as thoroughly as we would needles in hay!

male.sjis: ミューノは廃墟のどこかだ！ 絶対に見つけ出すぞ！
male.ascii: Murno must be somewhere deep in the ruins! We must find her no matter what!

female.sjis: ミューノは廃墟のどこかだよ 絶対に見つけ出すんだから！
female.ascii: Murno must be somewhere deep in the ruins! We must find her no matter what!

dialogue.sjis: 仕方ないな あの連中の勝手にされるのだけは 絶対にたえられん
dialogue.ascii: As if we have any other choice! I cannot bear to even think what those bastards are gonna do to her!

male.sjis: ミューノは廃墟のどこかだ！ 絶対に見つけ出すぞ！
male.ascii: Murno must be somewhere deep in the ruins! We must find her no matter what!

female.sjis: ミューノは廃墟のどこかだよ 絶対に見つけ出すんだから！
female.ascii: Murno must be somewhere deep in the ruins! We must find her no matter what!

dialogue.sjis: はい！ ミューノ様 待っててくださいね！
dialogue.ascii: Surely! Lady Murno Please wait for us!

dialogue.sjis: ミューノの村が 廃墟にされてたなんて
dialogue.ascii: Murno's village It's been reduced to ruins

dialogue.sjis: ハイ デスガ説明ハ 次ノ機会ニシマショウ 今ハ
dialogue.ascii: It Is. However, I Will Talk About It Next Time. Our Current Objective Is

dialogue.sjis: うん ミューノを追いかけよう！
dialogue.ascii: Yeah We have to find Murno!

dialogue.sjis: ミューノの村が 廃墟にされてたなんて
dialogue.ascii: Murno's village It's been reduced to ruins

dialogue.sjis: 以前は美しい村じゃったが いや、昔話は今度にしよう 今は
dialogue.ascii: It used to be a beautiful village, but nowNo, now's not the time to discuss. Let us go

dialogue.sjis: うん ミューノを追いかけよう！
dialogue.ascii: Yeah We have to find Murno!

dialogue.sjis: ミューノの村が 廃墟にされてたなんて
dialogue.ascii: Murno's village It's been reduced to ruins

dialogue.sjis: そうだ、すべてあの連中の仕業だ しかし今はイジイジと感傷に ひたっている時間はないぞ
dialogue.ascii: Yeah, those bastards are the reason whyHowever, we're just killing time if we stop for idle chit-chat.

dialogue.sjis: うん ミューノを追いかけよう！
dialogue.ascii: Yeah We have to find Murno!

dialogue.sjis: ミューノの村が 廃墟にされてたなんて
dialogue.ascii: Murno's village It's been reduced to ruins

dialogue.sjis: 昔は美しい村だったのですが お話ししたいことは沢山ありますけど 今は
dialogue.ascii: It used to be a beautiful village, and I want to tell you more, but we have no time. We have to

dialogue.sjis: うん ミューノを追いかけよう！
dialogue.ascii: Yeah We have to find Murno!

male.sjis: 調子悪そうだったけど 大丈夫なのか？
male.ascii: You don't look so good Are you okay?

female.sjis: 調子悪そうだったけど 大丈夫？
female.ascii: You don't look so good Are you okay?

dialogue.sjis: 問題アリマセン シカシ 魔石ノ収メラレテイタ ご※ぁんノ遺跡ニ 近ヅイテイマス
dialogue.ascii: There Are No ERRORS In My System. Though We Are Approaching The G※an Ruins, The Demon Stone's Origin.

dialogue.sjis: オソラク みゅーの様モ ソコダト思ワレルノデ 準備ヲシテオイタ方ガ イイデショウ
dialogue.ascii: I Am Certain Lady Murno Must Be There, So We Must Prepare Ourselves Accordingly.

dialogue.sjis: そっか わかったよ
dialogue.ascii: That's true I get what you mean.

dialogue.sjis: わかったわ
dialogue.ascii: I get what you mean.

male.sjis: 調子悪そうだったけど 大丈夫なのか？
male.ascii: You look kind of pale Are you okay?

female.sjis: 調子悪そうだったけど 大丈夫？
female.ascii: You look kind of pale Are you okay?

dialogue.sjis: ワガハイは大丈夫じゃ しかし、魔石の収められていた ゴヴァンの遺跡に近づいておる
dialogue.ascii: You jest, I am alright as rain! Though we're now closer to Govan Ruins, The Demon Stone's Origin.

dialogue.sjis: ミューノもおそらく そこじゃろうから 準備はしておいた方が良いじゃろう
dialogue.ascii: I am quite sure Murno would be there, so we must prepare ourselves thoroughly beforehand.

dialogue.sjis: そっか わかったよ
dialogue.ascii: That's true I get what you mean.

dialogue.sjis: わかったわ
dialogue.ascii: I get what you mean.

male.sjis: 調子悪そうだったけど 大丈夫なのか？
male.ascii: You seem quieter than usual Are you okay?

female.sjis: 調子悪そうだったけど 大丈夫？
female.ascii: You seem quieter than usual Are you okay?

dialogue.sjis: 当たり前だ それより、この先は魔石の 収められたゴヴァンの遺跡だぞ
dialogue.ascii: Of course, what do you take me for? In any case, we're closer to Govan Ruins, The Demon Stone's Origin.

dialogue.sjis: おそらくあいつらもソコだ キサマの方こそ準備はいいのか？
dialogue.ascii: Those bastards are gonna be there, too. You sure you can keep up?

dialogue.sjis: そっか わかったよ
dialogue.ascii: That's true Yeah, I can.

dialogue.sjis: わかったわ
dialogue.ascii: Of course I can.

male.sjis: 調子悪そうだったけど 大丈夫なのか？
male.ascii: You seem less chipper than usual Are you okay?

female.sjis: 調子悪そうだったけど 大丈夫？
female.ascii: You seem less chipper than usual Are you okay?

dialogue.sjis: 大丈夫ですわ でも、魔石の収められていた ゴヴァンの遺跡に近づいています
dialogue.ascii: I think I am Though we're now closer to Govan Ruins, The Demon Stone's Origin.

dialogue.sjis: ミューノ様もおそらく そこでしょうから 準備はしておいた方がいいですわ
dialogue.ascii: Lady Murno certainly should be there, so we must prepare ourselves thoroughly beforehand.

dialogue.sjis: そっか わかったよ
dialogue.ascii: That's true I get what you mean.

dialogue.sjis: わかったわ
dialogue.ascii: I get what you mean.

male.sjis: ギランとパイクは親方たちが 何とかしてくれそうだから もうジャマは入らないぞ
male.ascii: Seems like Master and the others handled Gillan and Pike, so I don't think they'll get in our way now

female.sjis: ギランとパイクは親方たちが 何とかしてくれそうだから もうジャマは入らないよ
female.ascii: Seems like Master and the others handled Gillan and Pike, so I don't think they'll get in our way now

dialogue.sjis: オソラク みゅーの様ハ みしゅーすノ廃墟ノ 奥ニアル ご※ぁんノ遺跡ニ イルハズデス
dialogue.ascii: It Is Most Probable That Lady Murno Is Within G※an Ruins, Located Deep Within The Mishus Abandoned Site.

male.sjis: よっし！ 早く行って、アニスから ミューノを取り戻すぞ！
male.ascii: Nice! Just a bit more and we'll finally take back Murno from Anise!

female.sjis: よぉし！ 早く行って、アニスから ミューノを取り戻そう！
female.ascii: Nice! Just a bit more and we'll finally take back Murno from Anise!

dialogue.sjis: 了解デス！
dialogue.ascii: Affirmative!

male.sjis: ギランとパイクは親方たちが 何とかしてくれそうだから もうジャマは入らないぞ
male.ascii: Seems like Master and the others handled Gillan and Pike, so I don't think they'll get in our way now

female.sjis: ギランとパイクは親方たちが 何とかしてくれそうだから もうジャマは入らないよ
female.ascii: Seems like Master and the others handled Gillan and Pike, so I don't think they'll get in our way now

dialogue.ascii: I am quite certain Murno must be within Govan Ruins. You can find it past the Mishus Abandoned Site!

male.sjis: よっし！ 早く行って、アニスから ミューノを取り戻すぞ！
male.ascii: Nice! Just a bit more and we'll finally take back Murno from Anise!

female.sjis: よぉし！ 早く行って、アニスから ミューノを取り戻そう！
female.ascii: Nice! Just a bit more and we'll finally take back Murno from Anise!

dialogue.sjis: 承知じゃっ！

male.ascii: Seems like Master and the others handled Gillan and Pike, so I don't think they'll get in our way now

female.sjis: ギランとパイクは親方たちが 何とかしてくれそうだから もうジャマは入らないよ
female.ascii: Seems like Master and the others handled Gillan and Pike, so I don't think they'll get in our way now

dialogue.sjis: ミューノは多分、ミシュースの廃墟の 奥にある、ゴヴァンの遺跡にいる いっしょに、あのクズもな
dialogue.ascii: I feel Murno must be at Govan Ruins far past Mishus Abandoned Site She's likely with that wretch

male.sjis: よっし！ 早く行って、アニスから ミューノを取り戻すぞ！
male.ascii: Nice! Just a bit more and we'll finally take back Murno from Anise!

female.sjis: よぉし！ 早く行って、アニスから ミューノを取り戻そう！
female.ascii: Nice! Just a bit more and we'll finally take back Murno from Anise!

dialogue.sjis: 今度こそ、消してやる！
dialogue.ascii: This time, I'll eliminate her once and for all!

male.sjis: ギランとパイクは親方たちが 何とかしてくれそうだから もうジャマは入らないぞ
male.ascii: Seems like Master and the others handled Gillan and Pike, so I don't think they'll get in our way now

female.sjis: ギランとパイクは親方たちが 何とかしてくれそうだから もうジャマは入らないよ
female.ascii: Seems like Master and the others handled Gillan and Pike, so I don't think they'll get in our way now

dialogue.sjis: ミューノ様はきっと ミシュースの廃墟の奥にある ゴヴァンの遺跡にいますわ！
dialogue.ascii: Surely, Lady Murno must still be within Govan Ruins. You can find it past the Mishus Abandoned Site!

male.sjis: よっし！ 早く行って、アニスから ミューノを取り戻すぞ！
male.ascii: Nice! Just a bit more and we'll finally take back Murno from Anise!

female.sjis: よぉし！ 早く行って、アニスから ミューノを取り戻そう！
female.ascii: Nice! Just a bit more and we'll finally take back Murno from Anise!

dialogue.sjis: はい！ ミューノ様、今、行きますわ！
dialogue.ascii: Indeed! Lady Murno, we're coming for you right now!
